entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 06:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
